About Pearl Jumeirah
Pearl Jumeirah by Meraas Development is a project with a lot of unique selling points.
Announced in 2010, this is reclaimed land right off Jumeirah which also applies Jumeirah construction by-laws on the peninsula. Even though it is located right off Jumeirah, it has freehold title.
The peninsula offers 300 residential plots and the master-development also incorporates a 90,000 sq. ft. retail area, a mosque, educational facilities and large open spaces.
Many different factors affect prices, such as plot size, location of the plot (sea facing vs internal), original price etc.']

On the ground floor, residents will enjoy a washroom, an en-suite bedroom, an en-suite maids room, plenty of storage and a fantastic open plan kitchen with an island countertop. Also, there are the open living and dining rooms which lead on via huge glass doors out to the garden.

descriptions:
['DescriptionLUXHABITAT are proud to present this flawless 4 bedroom modern contemporary luxury villa on Pearl Jumeira. Finished to the highest standard and using only the finest materials, this architectural masterpiece is a must see property.
Enter the property into a grand 7.5m high ceiling entrance foyer welcoming you to the incredibly open, spacious floor plan that flows seamlessly. It is complemented by high ceilings, floor to ceiling double glazed heat and UV protected glass windows and super modern features, which, along with the high standard of materials and craftsmanship are a credit to current owners. The property features large Onyx floor and wall tiles throughout, top quality walnut feature ceilings in some of the main living areas and an incredible unique walnut and steel staircase. The impressive ground floor living space features a large formal living and dining space, an immaculate designer Boffi kitchen with Miele appliances and two Subzero fridge freezers and stylish wine chillers. A spacious hidden preparation kitchen and two further dining/family living areas and guest powder room complete the ground floor.
The first floor boasts three large en suite bedrooms all with Villeroy & Boch modern bathroom suites, joined by a luxurious landing area again with Onyx flooring and walnut wall panels, cleverly disguising lots of storage space, home services, etc. Across the open landing area there is an an impeccable 1,250 sqft designer master suite featuring a 5-meter high ceiling, a luxury walk-in-closet and a luxury bathroom suite.
If you decide not to use the ultra contemporary staircase that is a prominent feature on all three floors, an elevator is available for convenient access to all floors. The basement is just another extraordinary feature in this incredible show quality dream home with a spacious living/entertaining area which has a large bar...']
